question: Who of the following is aquired as a top Nepalese leaders, assures assistance for peace and development of Nepal?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi held telephonic talks with Nepali Congress President Sher Bahadur Deuba, CPN-UML Chairman KP Sharma Oli, and CPN-Maoist Centre Chairman Pushpa Kamal Dahal. Our open border is a reflection of our unique bonding. He reaffirmed India's commitment to strengthen these bonds of friendship and work with the incoming Government on a broad range of development and reconstruction projects. India and China for peace and prosperity, Oli also invited the Indian PM for Nepal visit, and said he would send an official invitation to the Indian PM immediately after the formation of the new government.
